example_sentences.example_en: I wake up at 7 a.m.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je me réveille à 7 heures.

example_sentences.example_en: He gets up quickly.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il se lève rapidement.

example_sentences.example_en: She washes her face.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle se lave le visage.

example_sentences.example_en: I brush my teeth twice a day.
example_sentences.example_fr: Je me brosse les dents deux fois par jour.

example_sentences.example_en: He takes a shower every morning.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il prend une douche chaque matin.

example_sentences.example_en: She gets dressed quickly.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle s'habille rapidement.

example_sentences.example_en: He combs his hair before leaving.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il se coiffe avant de partir.

example_sentences.example_en: We have breakfast together.
example_sentences.example_fr: Nous prenons le petit-déjeuner ensemble.

example_sentences.example_en: Children go to school at 8 a.m.
example_sentences.example_fr: Les enfants vont à l'école à 8 heures.

example_sentences.example_en: She studies every evening.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle étudie chaque soir.

example_sentences.example_en: He works in an office.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il travaille dans un bureau.

example_sentences.example_en: We have lunch at noon.
example_sentences.example_fr: Nous déjeunons à midi.

example_sentences.example_en: He goes home after work.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il rentre à la maison après le travail.

example_sentences.example_en: She rests for a while.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle se repose un moment.

example_sentences.example_en: Children play in the park.
example_sentences.example_fr: Les enfants jouent dans le parc.

example_sentences.example_en: We watch TV in the evening.
example_sentences.example_fr: Nous regardons la télévision le soir.

example_sentences.example_en: He reads a book before bed.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il lit un livre avant de dormir.

example_sentences.example_en: We have dinner at 7 p.m.
example_sentences.example_fr: Nous dînons à 19 heures.

example_sentences.example_en: She takes a nap after lunch.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle fait une sieste après le déjeuner.

example_sentences.example_en: Children do their homework in the afternoon.
example_sentences.example_fr: Les enfants font leurs devoirs l'après-midi.

example_sentences.example_en: He exercises every morning.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il fait de l'exercice chaque matin.

example_sentences.example_en: She cooks dinner for her family.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle cuisine le dîner pour sa famille.

example_sentences.example_en: He cleans his room every week.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il nettoie sa chambre chaque semaine.

example_sentences.example_en: She washes the dishes after dinner.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle fait la vaisselle après le dîner.

example_sentences.example_en: He feeds his pets in the morning.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il nourrit ses animaux le matin.

example_sentences.example_en: We go shopping on Saturdays.
example_sentences.example_fr: Nous faisons les courses le samedi.

example_sentences.example_en: He drives to work every day.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il conduit au travail tous les jours.

example_sentences.example_en: She takes out the trash in the evening.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle sort la poubelle le soir.

example_sentences.example_en: He makes the bed every morning.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il fait le lit chaque matin.

example_sentences.example_en: She calls her friend after school.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle téléphone à son amie après l'école.

example_sentences.example_en: He meets his friends on weekends.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il rencontre ses amis le week-end.

example_sentences.example_en: We go for a walk after dinner.
example_sentences.example_fr: Nous nous promenons après le dîner.

example_sentences.example_en: He sleeps eight hours every night.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il dort huit heures chaque nuit.

example_sentences.example_en: She dreams about traveling.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle rêve de voyager.

example_sentences.example_en: He relaxes on Sundays.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il se détend le dimanche.

example_sentences.example_en: She prepares her bag for school.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle prépare son sac pour l'école.

example_sentences.example_en: She packs her suitcase for the trip.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle fait sa valise pour le voyage.

example_sentences.example_en: He irons his shirt before work.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il repasse sa chemise avant le travail.

example_sentences.example_en: He shaves every morning.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il se rase chaque matin.

example_sentences.example_en: She puts on makeup before going out.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle se maquille avant de sortir.

example_sentences.example_en: He takes medicine when he is sick.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il prend des médicaments quand il est malade.

example_sentences.example_en: She goes online to check emails.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle va sur Internet pour vérifier ses e-mails.

example_sentences.example_en: He charges his phone at night.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il recharge son téléphone la nuit.

example_sentences.example_en: She listens to music while studying.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle écoute de la musique en étudiant.

example_sentences.example_en: He sends a message to his friend.
example_sentences.example_fr: Il envoie un message à son ami.

example_sentences.example_en: She waits for the bus every morning.
example_sentences.example_fr: Elle attend le bus chaque matin.
